title: CONTRIBUTING
text: Submit issue Issues page

title: CONTRIBUTING
text: Fork repo Github account Clone version account machine account, e.g,. git clone https://github.com/<yourgithubusername>/rvertnet.git Make sure track progress upstream (.e., version rvertnet ropensci/rvertnet) git remote add upstream https://github.com/ropensci/rvertnet.git. making changes make sure pull changes upstream either git fetch upstream merge later git pull upstream fetch merge one step Make changes (bonus points making changes new feature branch) Push account Submit pull request home base ropensci/rvertnet

title: Introduction to rvertnet
text: Stable CRAN version Development version GitHub
code: install.packages("rvertnet") remotes::install_github("ropensci/rvertnet", build_vignettes = TRUE)

title: Introduction to rvertnet
code: library('rvertnet')

title: Introduction to rvertnet
text: Search Aves state California, limit 10 records major functions (searchbyterm(), spatialsearch(), vertsearch()) give back meta (metadata, list) data (data, data.frame) slot. metadata: Inspect data. tibble returned, get nice brief data summary: Search Mustela nigripes states Wyoming South Dakota, limit 20 records Search class Aves, state Nevada, coordinate uncertainty range (meters) less 25 meters
code: res <- searchbyterm(class = "Aves", state = "California", limit = 10, messages = FALSE) res$meta #> $request_date #> [1] "2024-02-15T03:20:26.162111" #>  #> $response_records #> [1] 10 #>  #> $submitted_query #> [1] "class:Aves" #>  #> $request_origin #> [1] "47.252877,-122.444291" #>  #> $limit #> [1] 10 #>  #> $last_cursor #> [1] "False:CskFCtIDCqQD9wAAABn_____jIGJmo2LkZqL0o-QjYuek96WkZuah9LNz87M0s_H0s_H_wAA_3RtoKCZi4ygoP8AAP9dno-PmpGYlpGa_wAA_3N0bZaRm5qH_wAA_12biJz_AAD_c3Rtm5CcoJab_wAA_12ektCQjZGWi5eQk5CYhtDPz87GmcjGztLGzcbJ0svPzprSxsfGy9Kdycqcz53NnMfGnpv_AAD_c3-ektCQjZGWi5eQk5CYhtDPz87GmcjGztLGzcbJ0svPzprSxsfGy9Kdycqcz53NnMfGnpv_AAD__wD-__6MgYmajYuRmovSj5CNi56T3paRm5qH0s3PzszSz8fSz8f_AHRtoKCZi4ygoP8AXZ6Pj5qRmJaRmv8Ac3RtlpGbmof_AF2biJz_AHN0bZuQnKCWm_8AXZ6S0JCNkZaLl5CTkJiG0M_PzsaZyMbO0sbNxsnSy8_OmtLGx8bL0p3JypzPnc2cx8aem_8Ac3-ektCQjZGWi5eQk5CYhtDPz87GmcjGztLGzcbJ0svPzprSxsfGy9Kdycqcz53NnMfGnpv_AP_-EAohBN0EkB08Gxk5AAAAAOb___9IClAAWgsJJ5Q__S_keXEQA2D6k___0oFCABA6Ac" #>  #> $query_version #> [1] "search.py 2016-08-15T16:43+02:00" #>  #> $matching_records #> [1] ">10000" #>  #> $api_version #> [1] "api.py 2017-11-24T12:16-03:00" res$data #> # A tibble: 10 × 46 #>    kingdom  recordedby    higherclassification stateprovince basisofrecord month #>    <chr>    <chr>         <chr>                <chr>         <chr>         <chr> #>  1 Animalia NSW STATE GO… Animalia | Chordata… New South Wa… PreservedSpe… 11    #>  2 Animalia TARONGA ZOO … Animalia | Chordata… New South Wa… PreservedSpe… 6     #>  3 Animalia MCLENNAN, MR… Animalia | Chordata… Queensland    PreservedSpe… 4     #>  4 Animalia WATTS, MIKE   Animalia | Chordata… New South Wa… PreservedSpe… 1     #>  5 Animalia HOLCOMBE, B.  Animalia | Chordata… New South Wa… PreservedSpe… 7     #>  6 Animalia RHODES, C. A. Animalia | Chordata… New South Wa… PreservedSpe… 10    #>  7 Animalia C. HEDLEY, A… Animalia | Chordata… Queensland    PreservedSpe… 10    #>  8 Animalia ROBINSON, SEP Animalia | Chordata… New South Wa… PreservedSpe… 10    #>  9 Animalia SHARP, GEORGE Animalia | Chordata… Queensland    PreservedSpe… 11    #> 10 Animalia J.A. KEAST, … Animalia | Chordata… New South Wa… PreservedSpe… 3     #> # ℹ 40 more variables: decimallongitude <chr>, phylum <chr>, references <chr>, #> #   year <chr>, startdayofyear <chr>, taxonrank <chr>, specificepithet <chr>, #> #   bibliographiccitation <chr>, family <chr>, countrycode <chr>, #> #   geodeticdatum <chr>, coordinateuncertaintyinmeters <chr>, #> #   highergeography <chr>, accessrights <chr>, verbatimlocality <chr>, #> #   verbatimeventdate <chr>, day <chr>, eventid <chr>, collectioncode <chr>, #> #   occurrencestatus <chr>, locationremarks <chr>, coordinateprecision <chr>, … res <- searchbyterm(specificepithet = "nigripes", genus = "Mustela", state = "(wyoming OR south dakota)", limit = 20, messages = FALSE) res$data #> # A tibble: 20 × 76 #>    month decimallongitude startdayofyear accessrights                    kingdom #>    <chr> <chr>            <chr>          <chr>                           <chr>   #>  1 1     -88.305352       1              http://vertnet.org/resources/n… Animal… #>  2 03    -104.77472       74             http://vertnet.org/resources/n… Animal… #>  3 02    -103.731861      52             http://vertnet.org/resources/n… Animal… #>  4 12    -105.0137067407  349            http://vertnet.org/resources/n… Animal… #>  5 2     -103.067931      32             http://vertnet.org/resources/n… Animal… #>  6 1     -103.067931      1              http://vertnet.org/resources/n… Animal… #>  7 02    -103.067931      40             http://vertnet.org/resources/n… Animal… #>  8 05    -104.926320116   126            http://vertnet.org/resources/n… Animal… #>  9 02    -104.79742       42             http://vertnet.org/resources/n… Animal… #> 10 04    -106.1329632593  108            http://vertnet.org/resources/n… Animal… #> 11 10    -105.064706      304            http://vertnet.org/resources/n… Animal… #> 12 4     -106.3467709375  92             http://vertnet.org/resources/n… Animal… #> 13 05    -104.225829      133            http://vertnet.org/resources/n… Animal… #> 14 09    -105.873904      258            http://vertnet.org/resources/n… Animal… #> 15 12    -105.298898      362            http://vertnet.org/resources/n… Animal… #> 16 06    -105.376986      152            http://vertnet.org/resources/n… Animal… #> 17 11    -104.3831505257  305            http://vertnet.org/resources/n… Animal… #> 18 11    -104.7714765     314            http://vertnet.org/resources/n… Animal… #> 19 09    -106.9094        267            http://vertnet.org/resources/n… Animal… #> 20 08    -107.5579841     234            http://vertnet.org/resources/n… Animal… #> # ℹ 71 more variables: verbatimcoordinatesystem <chr>, day <chr>, #> #   identificationverificationstatus <chr>, occurrenceid <chr>, #> #   identificationqualifier <chr>, georeferenceddate <chr>, #> #   verbatimeventdate <chr>, coordinateuncertaintyinmeters <chr>, #> #   higherclassification <chr>, sex <chr>, year <chr>, specificepithet <chr>, #> #   basisofrecord <chr>, geodeticdatum <chr>, occurrenceremarks <chr>, #> #   highergeography <chr>, continent <chr>, scientificname <chr>, … res <- searchbyterm(class = "Aves", stateprovince = "Nevada", error = "<25", messages = FALSE) res$data #> # A tibble: 1,000 × 91 #>    georeferenceprotocol       higherclassification stateprovince lifestage month #>    <chr>                      <chr>                <chr>         <chr>     <chr> #>  1 MaNIS/HerpNet/ORNIS Geore… Animalia; Chordata;… Nevada        U-Ad.     3     #>  2 MaNIS/HerpNet/ORNIS Geore… Animalia; Chordata;… Nevada        U-Ad      12    #>  3 MaNIS/HerpNet/ORNIS Geore… Animalia; Chordata;… Nevada        Nestling  5     #>  4 MaNIS/HerpNet/ORNIS Geore… Animalia; Chordata;… Nevada        U-Ad.     9     #>  5 MaNIS/HerpNet/ORNIS Geore… Animalia; Chordata;… Nevada        U-Ad.     9     #>  6 MaNIS/HerpNet/ORNIS Geore… Animalia; Chordata;… Nevada        U-Ad.     9     #>  7 MaNIS/HerpNet/ORNIS Geore… Animalia; Chordata;… Nevada        Downy     6     #>  8 MaNIS/HerpNet/ORNIS Geore… Animalia; Chordata;… Nevada        U-Ad.     6     #>  9 MaNIS/HerpNet/ORNIS Geore… Animalia; Chordata;… Nevada        U-Ad.     6     #> 10 MaNIS/HerpNet/ORNIS Geore… Animalia; Chordata;… Nevada        U-Ad.     6     #> # ℹ 990 more rows #> # ℹ 86 more variables: decimallongitude <chr>, phylum <chr>, #> #   verbatimlongitude <chr>, year <chr>, specificepithet <chr>, #> #   bibliographiccitation <chr>, verbatimlatitude <chr>, family <chr>, #> #   locality <chr>, geodeticdatum <chr>, coordinateuncertaintyinmeters <chr>, #> #   highergeography <chr>, continent <chr>, scientificnameauthorship <chr>, #> #   day <chr>, kingdom <chr>, institutioncode <chr>, scientificname <chr>, …

title: Introduction to rvertnet
text: can pass data object directly dplyr functions. , get table record counts species descending order.
code: library("dplyr") out <- searchbyterm(genus = "Ochotona", limit = 800) out$data %>%   group_by(scientificname) %>%   summarise(count = length(scientificname)) %>%   arrange(desc(count)) #> # A tibble: 20 × 2 #>    scientificname                  count #>    <chr>                           <int> #>  1 Ochotona princeps                 450 #>  2 Ochotona pallasi                  129 #>  3 Ochotona princeps saxatilis       103 #>  4 Ochotona hyperborea                30 #>  5 Ochotona dauurica                  21 #>  6 Ochotona collaris                  15 #>  7 Ochotona princeps figginsi         14 #>  8 Ochotona princeps taylori           8 #>  9 Ochotona princeps schisticeps       6 #> 10 Ochotona alpina                     4 #> 11 Ochotona princeps muiri             4 #> 12 Ochotona hyperborea mantchurica     3 #> 13 Ochotona princeps incana            3 #> 14 Ochotona princeps princeps          3 #> 15 Ochotona princeps murri             2 #> 16 Ochotona princeps brunnescens       1 #> 17 Ochotona princeps jewetti           1 #> 18 Ochotona princeps tutelata          1 #> 19 Ochotona princeps uinta             1 #> 20 Ochotona princeps ventorum          1

title: Introduction to rvertnet
text: Spatial search service allows search point defined latitude longitude pair, radius (meters) point. three parameters required.
code: res <- spatialsearch(lat = 33.529, lon = -105.694, radius = 2000, limit = 10, messages = FALSE) res$data #> # A tibble: 10 × 62 #>    month decimallongitude startdayofyear minimumelevationinmeters accessrights   #>    <chr> <chr>            <chr>          <chr>                    <chr>          #>  1 07    -105.68633       193            2182.368                 http://vertne… #>  2 07    -105.705479      196            2023.872                 http://vertne… #>  3 07    -105.705479      196            2023.872                 http://vertne… #>  4 07    -105.705479      196            2023.872                 http://vertne… #>  5 07    -105.705479      196            2023.872                 http://vertne… #>  6 07    -105.705479      196            2023.872                 http://vertne… #>  7 07    -105.705479      196            2023.872                 http://vertne… #>  8 07    -105.705479      196            2023.872                 http://vertne… #>  9 07    -105.705479      196            2023.872                 http://vertne… #> 10 07    -105.705479      196            2023.872                 http://vertne… #> # ℹ 57 more variables: kingdom <chr>, day <chr>, #> #   identificationverificationstatus <chr>, occurrenceid <chr>, #> #   identificationqualifier <chr>, georeferenceddate <chr>, #> #   verbatimeventdate <chr>, coordinateuncertaintyinmeters <chr>, #> #   higherclassification <chr>, sex <chr>, year <chr>, specificepithet <chr>, #> #   basisofrecord <chr>, geodeticdatum <chr>, occurrenceremarks <chr>, #> #   highergeography <chr>, continent <chr>, scientificname <chr>, …

title: Introduction to rvertnet
text: vertsearch() provides simple full text search fields. info see docs. example: Limit number records returned (1000)
code: res <- vertsearch(taxon = "aves", state = "california", limit = 10) res$data #> # A tibble: 10 × 57 #>    higherclassification       stateprovince basisofrecord month decimallongitude #>    <chr>                      <chr>         <chr>         <chr> <chr>            #>  1 Animalia | Chordata |  | … California    PreservedSpe… 2     -121.7833        #>  2 Animalia | Chordata |  | … California    PreservedSpe… 6     -122.15          #>  3 Animalia | Chordata |  | … California    PreservedSpe… 5     -120.9014        #>  4 Animalia; Chordata; Aves;… South Caroli… PreservedSpe… 2     -79.86151        #>  5 Animalia; Chordata; Aves;… California    PreservedSpe… 1     -121.93300       #>  6 Animalia; Chordata; Aves;… California    PreservedSpe… 1     -121.93300       #>  7 Animalia; Chordata; Aves;… California    PreservedSpe… 7     -121.85760       #>  8 Animalia; Chordata; Aves;… California    PreservedSpe… 7     -121.85760       #>  9 Animalia; Chordata; Aves;… California    PreservedSpe… 7     -121.85760       #> 10 Animalia; Chordata; Aves;… California    PreservedSpe… 7     -121.85760       #> # ℹ 52 more variables: phylum <chr>, references <chr>, year <chr>, #> #   startdayofyear <chr>, taxonrank <chr>, specificepithet <chr>, #> #   bibliographiccitation <chr>, family <chr>, countrycode <chr>, #> #   geodeticdatum <chr>, coordinateuncertaintyinmeters <chr>, #> #   highergeography <chr>, continent <chr>, verbatimlocality <chr>, day <chr>, #> #   kingdom <chr>, collectioncode <chr>, occurrencestatus <chr>, #> #   coordinateprecision <chr>, institutioncode <chr>, scientificname <chr>, … res <- vertsearch("(kansas state OR KSU)", limit = 200) res$data #> # A tibble: 200 × 78 #>    individualcount georeferenceprotocol         recordedby bibliographiccitation #>    <chr>           <chr>                        <chr>      <chr>                 #>  1 8               GEOLocate (Rios & Bart, 201… H. W. Rob… Academy of Natural S… #>  2 11              GEOLocate (Rios & Bart, 201… H. W. Rob… Academy of Natural S… #>  3 3               GEOLocate (Rios & Bart, 201… H. W. Rob… Academy of Natural S… #>  4 <NA>            <NA>                         <NA>       California Academy o… #>  5 <NA>            <NA>                         <NA>       California Academy o… #>  6 <NA>            <NA>                         <NA>       California Academy o… #>  7 1               VertNet Georeferencing Guid… MCCOY, C … Carnegie Museum of N… #>  8 1               VertNet Georeferencing Guid… MCCOY, C … Carnegie Museum of N… #>  9 1               VertNet Georeferencing Guid… MCCOY, C … Carnegie Museum of N… #> 10 1               VertNet Georeferencing Guid… MCCOY, C … Carnegie Museum of N… #> # ℹ 190 more rows #> # ℹ 74 more variables: stateprovince <chr>, basisofrecord <chr>, month <chr>, #> #   decimallongitude <chr>, phylum <chr>, references <chr>, #> #   georeferencedby <chr>, year <chr>, taxonrank <chr>, specificepithet <chr>, #> #   family <chr>, countrycode <chr>, locality <chr>, geodeticdatum <chr>, #> #   coordinateuncertaintyinmeters <chr>, highergeography <chr>, #> #   continent <chr>, day <chr>, kingdom <chr>, georeferenceddate <chr>, …

title: Introduction to rvertnet
text: searchbyterm(), spatialsearch(), vertsearch(), can request 1000 records. VertNet limits request 1000 records, internally package, request 1000 records, ’ll continue send requests get records want. See VertNet docs information .

title: Introduction to rvertnet
text: bigsearch() specifies termwise search (like searchbyterm()), requests available records made available download tab-delimited text file.
code: bigsearch(genus = "ochotona", rfile = "mydata", email = "you@gmail.com") #> Processing request... #>  #> Download of records file 'mydata' requested for 'you@gmail.com' #>  #> Query/URL: "http://api.vertnet-portal.appspot.com/api/download?q=%7B%22q%22:%22genus:ochotona%22,%22n%22:%22mydata%22,%22e%22:%22you@gmail.com%22%7D" #>  #> Thank you! Download instructions will be sent by email.

title: Introduction to rvertnet
text: previous examples, ’ve suppressed messages concise output, can set messages=TRUE get helpful messages - messages=TRUE also default setting don’t specify parameter messages printed console.
code: res <- searchbyterm(class = "Aves", state = "California", limit = 10, messages = TRUE)

what: Search Vertnet, a Database of Vertebrate Specimen Records

text: Stable CRAN version Development version GitHub
code: install.packages("rvertnet") remotes::install_github("ropensci/rvertnet", build_vignettes = TRUE)

title: Search Vertnet, a Database of Vertebrate Specimen Records

title: Search Vertnet, a Database of Vertebrate Specimen Records

what: Request to download a large number of VertNet records. — bigsearch
title: Request to download a large number of VertNet records. — bigsearch
text: Specifies term-wise search (like searchbyterm) requests available  records made available download tab-delimited text file.

title: Request to download a large number of VertNet records. — bigsearch
code: bigsearch(..., rfile, email, messages = TRUE, callopts = list())

title: Request to download a large number of VertNet records. — bigsearch
text: ... arguments, must named, see searchbyterm() details rfile name results file download (character). Required. email email address can contacted records ready download (character). Required. messages (logical) Print progress information messages. Default: TRUE callopts (named list) Curl arguments passed crul::verb-GET

title: Request to download a large number of VertNet records. — bigsearch
text: Prints messages progress, returns NULL

title: Request to download a large number of VertNet records. — bigsearch
text: bigsearch allows request records tab-delimited text file. best way access large number records, search results indicate >1000 records available. notified email records ready download.

title: Request to download a large number of VertNet records. — bigsearch
text: suggest reading data data.table::fread() - fast sometimes large datasets get using function, usually robust formatting issues.

title: Request to download a large number of VertNet records. — bigsearch
text: https://github.com/VertNet/webapp/wiki/-API-search-function

title: Request to download a large number of VertNet records. — bigsearch
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # replace "big@search.luv" with your own email address bigsearch(genus = "ochotona", rfile = "pikaRecords", email = "big@search.luv")  # Pass in curl options for curl debugging bigsearch(genus = "ochotona", rfile = "pikaRecords",   email = "big@search.luv", verbose = TRUE)  # Use more than one year query bigsearch(class = "aves", year = c(">=1976", "<=1986"),           rfile = "test-bigsearch1", email = "big@search.luv") } # }

title: These functions are defunct — dump-defunct
text: functions defunct

title: These functions are defunct — dump-defunct
code: dump_init(...)  dump_tbl(...)  dump_links(...)

title: These functions are defunct — dump-defunct
text: Vertnet dumps complicated setup. Please get touch Vertnet maintainers package want help using bulk data.

title: Defunct functions in rvertnet — rvertnet-defunct
text: vertavailablemaps: Function now defunct, .e., available anymore. vertlocations: Function now defunct, .e., available anymore. vertoccurrence: Function now defunct, .e., available anymore. vertoccurrencecount: Function now defunct, .e., available anymore. vertproviders: Function now defunct, .e., available anymore. verttaxa: Function now defunct, .e., available anymore.

what: Search VertNet archives using R — rvertnet-package
title: Search VertNet archives using R — rvertnet-package
text: variety ways search VertNet

title: Search VertNet archives using R — rvertnet-package
text: Search Aves state California, limit 10 records, e.g.: searchbyterm(class = "Aves", state = "California", lim = 10, verbose = FALSE) Search Mustela nigripes states Wyoming South Dakota, limit 20 records, e.g.: searchbyterm(genus = "Mustela", specificepithet = "nigripes",    state = "(wyoming south dakota)", limit = 20, verbose=FALSE)

title: Search VertNet archives using R — rvertnet-package
text: Specifies termwise search (like searchbyterm()), requests available records  made available download tab-delimited text file. bigsearch(genus = "ochotona", rf = "pikaRecords", email = "big@search.luv")

title: Search VertNet archives using R — rvertnet-package
text: spatialsearch(lat = 33.529, lon = -105.694, radius = 2000, limit = 10, verbose = FALSE)

title: Search VertNet archives using R — rvertnet-package
text: Find records using global full-text search VertNet archives. vertsearch(taxon = "aves", state = "california")

title: Search VertNet archives using R — rvertnet-package
text: possible get results requesting data VertNet, run function 10 seconds later, get result. sure , something Vertnet's infrastucture aware . Point , sure made mistakes parameters, etc., simply run function call .

title: Search VertNet archives using R — rvertnet-package
text: Maintainer: Dave Slager slager@uw.edu (ORCID) [contributor] Authors: Scott Chamberlain myrmecocystus@gmail.com (ORCID) contributors: Chris Ray [contributor] Vijay Barve [contributor]

title: Search by term — searchbyterm
text: Flexible search records using keywords/terms

title: Search by term — searchbyterm
code: searchbyterm(   ...,   limit = 1000,   compact = TRUE,   messages = TRUE,   only_dwc = TRUE,   callopts = list() )

title: Search by term — searchbyterm
text: ... arguments, must named, see section Parameters details. Multiple inputs single parameter supported, construct string operators; see examples . limit (numeric) Limit number records returned. >1000 results, use cursor internally, still get results asked . See also bigsearch() get larger result sets text file via email. compact (logical) Return compact data frame messages (logical) Print progress information messages. Default: TRUE only_dwc (logical) whether return Darwin Core term fields. Default: TRUE callopts (named list) Curl arguments passed crul::verb-GET

title: Search by term — searchbyterm
text: list two slots: meta: named list metadata search results data: data frame search results, columns vary

title: Search by term — searchbyterm
text: searchbyterm() builds query input parameters based Darwin Core (dwc) terms (full list terms, see https://code.google.com/p/darwincore/wiki/DarwinCoreTerms).

title: Search by term — searchbyterm
text: parameters can passed searchbyterm(). others silently dropped. See https://github.com/VertNet/webapp/wiki/-API-search-function details taxon kingdom (character) Taxonomic kingdom phylum (character) Taxonomic phylum class (character) Taxonomic class order (character) Taxonomic order family (character) Taxonomic family genus (character) Taxonomic genus specificepithet (character) Taxonomic specific epithet, e.g. (sapiens Homo sapiens) infraspecificepithet (character) Taxonomic infraspecific epithet scientificname (character) scientific name vernacularname (character) verncular name event year (numeric) Year range years designated comparison operators "<", ">", "<=" ">=". can pass one queries, vector. See example month (numeric) month range months designated comparison operators "<", ">", "<=" ">=". can pass one queries, vector. See example day (numeric) day range days designated comparison operators "<", ">", "<=" ">=". can pass one queries, vector. See example eventdate Event date associated occurrence record; yyyy-mm-dd range yyyy-mm-dd/yyyy-mm-dd (character) record level institutioncode (character) Code name provider/institution record occurrenceid (character) Provider's unique identifier occurrence record catalognumber (character) Provider's catalog number ID record collectioncode (character) collection code license (dcterms:license) license string iptlicense (eml:intellectualRights) license string basisofrecord (character) one PreservedSpecimen, FossilSpecimen, MaterialSample, Occurrence, MachineObservation, HumanObservation hasmedia (logical) Record also references associated media, film video isfossil (logical) dwc:basisOfRecord FossilSpecimen collection paleo collection haslicense (logical) dcterms:license eml:intellectualRights license designated identification typestatus (character) type status hastypestatus (logical) type status known occurrence iptrecordid (character) (dwc:occurrenceID) recordedby (character) Collector name recordnumber (character) record number fieldnumber (character) field number establishmentmeans (character) establishment means wascaptive (logical) (dwc:establishmentMeans occurrenceRemarks suggests captive) wasinvasive (logical) (organism recorded invasive occurred) sex (character) standardized sex original sex field extracted elsewhere record lifestage (character) lifeStage original sex field extracted elsewhere record preparations (sure means) hastissue (logical) Record likely reference tissues reproductivecondition (sure means) location continent (character) Continent search occurrence country (character) Country search occurrence stateprovince (character) State province search occurrence county (character) County search occurrence island (character) Island search occurrence igroup (character) Island group search occurrence municipality (character) waterbody (character) geodeticdatum (character) georeferencedby (character) georeferenceverificationstatus (character) location Google GeoField dwc:decimalLatitude, dwc:decimalLongitude mappable (logical) Record includes valid coordinates decimal latitude decimal longitude geological context bed (character) geological bed formation (character) geological formation group (character) geological group member (character) geological member traits haslength (logical) (value length extracted?) hasmass (logical) (value mass extraccted?) hassex (logical) (record sex?) haslifestage (logical) (record life stage?) lengthtype (character) type length measurement extracted record, can refer number range) ('total length', 'standard length', 'snout-vent length','head-body length', 'fork length', 'total length range', 'standard length range', 'snout-vent length range', 'head-body length range', 'fork length range' lengthinmm (numeric) length measurement extracted record massing (numeric) mass measurement extracted record (detailed information trait extraction aggregation querying via VertNet portal, see http://vertnet.org/resources/traitsguide.html data set gbifdatasetid (character) GBIF identifier data set gbifpublisherid (character) GBIF identifier data publishing organization lastindexed (character) date (YYYY-MM-DD) record recently indexed VertNet networks (character) one MaNIS, ORNIS, HerpNET, FishNet, VertNet, Arctos, Paleo migrator (character) version migrator used process data set, date form (YYYY-MM-DD) orgcountry (character) country organization located orgstateprovince (character) first-level administrative unit organization located index rank (character) higher number means record complete respect georeferences, scientific names, event dates vntype (character) Type record; "specimen" "observation" hashid (integer) value distribute records 10k bins; 0-9998 coordinateuncertaintyinmeters (character) Coordinate uncertainty meters (numeric) range uncertainty values designated comparison operators "<", ">", "<=", ">="

title: Search by term — searchbyterm
text: possible get results call searchbyterm(), run 10 seconds later, get result. sure , something Vertnet's infrastucture aware . Point , sure made mistakes parameters, etc., simply run function call .

title: Search by term — searchbyterm
text: https://github.com/VertNet/webapp/wiki/-API-search-function

title: Search by term — searchbyterm
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Find multiple species out <- searchbyterm(genus = "ochotona",   specificepithet = "(princeps OR collaris)", limit=10)  # iptrecordid searchbyterm(iptrecordid = "7108667e-1483-4d04-b204-6a44a73a5219")  # you can pass more than one, as above, in a single string in parens records <- "(7108667e-1483-4d04-b204-6a44a73a5219 OR 1efe900e-bde2-45e7-9747-2b2c3e5f36c3)" searchbyterm(iptrecordid = records, callopts = list(verbose = TRUE))  # Specifying a range (in meters) for uncertainty in spatial location # (use quotes) out <- searchbyterm(class = "aves", stateprovince = "nevada",    coordinateuncertaintyinmeters = "<25") out <- searchbyterm(class = "aves", stateprovince = "california", year = 1976,   coordinateuncertaintyinmeters = "<=1000")  # Specifying records by event date (use quotes) out <- searchbyterm(class = "aves", stateprovince = "california",   eventdate = "2009-03-25") # ...but specifying a date range may not work out <- searchbyterm(specificepithet = "nigripes",   eventdate = "1935-09-01/1935-09-30")  # Pass in curl options for curl debugging out <- searchbyterm(class = "aves", limit = 10,  callopts = list(verbose = TRUE))  # Use more than one year query searchbyterm(genus = "mustela", specificepithet = "nigripes",    year = c('>=1900', '<=1940'))  searchbyterm(sex  = "male", limit = 30)$data$sex searchbyterm(lifestage  = "juvenile", limit = 30)$data$lifestage } # }

what: Find records within some distance of a point given latitude and longitude. — spatialsearch
title: Find records within some distance of a point given latitude and longitude. — spatialsearch
text: Searches decimal latitude longitude return occurrence record within input distance (radius) input point.

title: Find records within some distance of a point given latitude and longitude. — spatialsearch
code: spatialsearch(   lat,   long,   radius,   limit = 1000,   compact = TRUE,   messages = TRUE,   ... )

title: Find records within some distance of a point given latitude and longitude. — spatialsearch
text: lat (numeric) Latitude central point, decimal degrees required. long (numeric) Longitude central point, decimal degrees required. radius (numeric) Radius search, meters. default value parameter. required. limit (integer) Limit number records returned. >1000 results, use cursor internally, still get results asked . See also bigsearch() get larger result sets text file via email. compact (logical) Return compact data frame. default: TRUE messages (logical) Print progress information messages. Default: TRUE ... Curl arguments passed crul::HttpClient

title: Find records within some distance of a point given latitude and longitude. — spatialsearch
text: list two slots: meta: named list metadata search results data: data frame search results, columns vary

title: Find records within some distance of a point given latitude and longitude. — spatialsearch
text: spatialsearch() finds records taxa decimal lat/long coordinates within given radius (meters) coordinates.

title: Find records within some distance of a point given latitude and longitude. — spatialsearch
text: https://github.com/VertNet/webapp/wiki/-API-search-function

title: Find records within some distance of a point given latitude and longitude. — spatialsearch
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ res <- spatialsearch(lat = 33.529, long = -105.694, radius = 2000,   limit = 10)  # Pass in curl options for curl debugging out <- spatialsearch(lat = 33.529, long = -105.694, radius = 2000,   limit = 10, verbose = TRUE) } # }

title: Trait focused search — traitsearch
text: Trait focused search

title: Trait focused search — traitsearch
code: traitsearch(   taxon = NULL,   has_mass = FALSE,   has_length = FALSE,   has_sex = FALSE,   has_lifestage = FALSE,   length_type = NULL,   length = NULL,   mass = NULL,   limit = 1000,   compact = TRUE,   messages = TRUE,   callopts = list(),   ... )

title: Trait focused search — traitsearch
text: taxon (character) Taxonomic identifier text search has_mass (logical) limit records mass data (stored massing). Default: FALSE has_length (logical) limit records length data (stored lengthinmm). Default: FALSE has_sex (logical) limit records sex data (stored sex). Default: FALSE has_lifestage (logical) limit records lifestage data (stored lifestage). Default: FALSE length_type (character) length type, one 'total length', 'standard length', 'snout-vent length', 'head-body length', 'fork length', 'total length range', 'standard length range', 'snout-vent length range', 'head-body length range', 'fork length range'. (stored lengthtype) Default: NULL length (list) list query terms length, e.g., "< 100" mass (list) list query terms mass, e.g., "< 100" limit (numeric) Limit number records returned. >1000 results, use cursor internally, still get results asked . See also bigsearch get larger result sets text file via email. compact Return compact data frame (boolean) messages Print progress information messages. Default: TRUE callopts curl options list passed HttpClient, see examples ... (character) Additional search terms. must unnamed

title: Trait focused search — traitsearch
text: list, returned vertsearch, data data slot

title: Trait focused search — traitsearch
text: Wraps vertsearch, parameters, additional parameters added make querying traits easy.

title: Trait focused search — traitsearch
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ traitsearch(has_mass = TRUE, limit = 3) traitsearch(has_lifestage = TRUE) traitsearch(has_mass = TRUE, has_length = TRUE) res <- traitsearch(length_type = "total length",   length = list(">= 300", "<= 1000")) summary(as.numeric(res$data$lengthinmm)) res <- traitsearch(has_mass = TRUE, mass = list(">= 20", "<= 500")) summary(as.numeric(res$data$massing))  traitsearch(taxon = "aves", has_mass = TRUE, limit = 100) } # }

what: Search by Vertnet occurrence ID — vert_id
title: Search by Vertnet occurrence ID — vert_id
text: Search Vertnet occurrence ID

title: Search by Vertnet occurrence ID — vert_id
code: vert_id(ids, compact = TRUE, messages = TRUE, ...)

title: Search by Vertnet occurrence ID — vert_id
text: ids (character) VertNet IDs, one . Required. compact (logical) Return compact data frame. , remove empty columns. Default: TRUE messages (logical) Print progress information messages. Default: TRUE ... Curl arguments passed crul::HttpClient

title: Search by Vertnet occurrence ID — vert_id
text: list, data frame search results, list metadata

title: Search by Vertnet occurrence ID — vert_id
text: VertNet IDs can variety things, URIs (.e., http://...), others start urn. Internally function filter data darwin core terms . see terms use, see: print(simple_dwc_terms). See documentation information: ?simple_dwc_terms

title: Search by Vertnet occurrence ID — vert_id
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ vert_id(ids = "urn:catalog:CM:Herps:116520") ids <- c("http://arctos.database.museum/guid/MSB:Mamm:56979?seid=1643089",           "urn:catalog:CM:Herps:116520",          "urn:catalog:AUM:Fish:13271") res <- vert_id(ids) res$data$occurrenceid  out <- vertsearch(taxon = "aves", state = "california", limit = 5) (ids <- out$data$occurrenceid) res <- vert_id(ids) identical(sort(res$data$occurrenceid), sort(ids)) } # }

what: Make a simple map to visualize VertNet data. — vertmap
title: Make a simple map to visualize VertNet data. — vertmap
text: Plots record locations world regional map using latitude/longitude data returned VertNet search.

title: Make a simple map to visualize VertNet data. — vertmap
code: vertmap(   input = NULL,   mapdatabase = "world",   region = ".",   geom = geom_point,   jitter = NULL )

title: Make a simple map to visualize VertNet data. — vertmap
text: input Output vertsearch, searchbyterm, spatialsearch. Must include columns "decimallatitude" "decimallongitude" mapdatabase base map data displayed; choose determines can choose region parameter; one : county, state, usa, world, world2, france, italy, nz region region data displayed; see region names "world" database layer, run sort(unique(map_data("world")$region)) loading packages maps ggplot2; see region names US "state" layer, run sort(unique(map_data("state")$region)) geom Specifies type object plotted; one : geom_point geom_jitter (use quotes) jitter geom = geom_jitter, amount jitter points width, height, . Default

title: Make a simple map to visualize VertNet data. — vertmap
text: Map record locations displayed selected base map

title: Make a simple map to visualize VertNet data. — vertmap
text: vertmap uses decimal latitude longitude data records generated rvertnet search display returned records specified base map. Taxa color-coded scientific name, available. Adapt vertmap code construct maps according specifications.

title: Make a simple map to visualize VertNet data. — vertmap
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ out <- vertsearch("Junco hyemalis") # get occurrence records vertmap(out)                        # map occurrence records  # Records are color coded by dwc term "scientificname" - sometimes unavailble out <- vertsearch("mustela nigripes") vertmap(input = out, mapdatabase = "state")  # Use searchbyterm() to match records with mapped region spec <- searchbyterm(genus = "ochotona", specificepithet = "princeps", state = "california", limit = 200) vertmap(input = spec, mapdatabase = "state", region = "california")  # Many species splist <- c("Accipiter erythronemius", "Aix sponsa", "Haliaeetus leucocephalus",     "Corvus corone", "Threskiornis molucca", "Merops malimbicus") out <- lapply(splist, function(x) vertsearch(t=x, lim=100)) out <- dplyr::bind_rows(lapply(out, "[[", "data")) vertmap(out) ## jitter points library("ggplot2") vertmap(out, geom = geom_jitter, jitter = position_jitter(1, 6)) } # }

what: Find records using a global full-text search of VertNet archives. — vertsearch
title: Find records using a global full-text search of VertNet archives. — vertsearch
text: Returns record containing target text field record.

title: Find records using a global full-text search of VertNet archives. — vertsearch
code: vertsearch(   taxon = NULL,   ...,   limit = 1000,   compact = TRUE,   messages = TRUE,   only_dwc = TRUE,   callopts = list() )

title: Find records using a global full-text search of VertNet archives. — vertsearch
text: taxon (character) Taxonomic identifier text search ... (character) Additional search terms. must unnamed limit (numeric) Limit number records returned. >1000 results, use cursor internally, still get results asked . See also bigsearch get larger result sets text file via email. compact Return compact data frame (boolean) messages Print progress information messages. Default: TRUE only_dwc (logical) whether return Darwin Core term fields. Default: TRUE callopts curl options list passed HttpClient, see examples

title: Find records using a global full-text search of VertNet archives. — vertsearch
text: data frame search results

title: Find records using a global full-text search of VertNet archives. — vertsearch
text: vertsearch performs nonspecific search input within every record field VertNet archives. specific search, try searchbyterm

title: Find records using a global full-text search of VertNet archives. — vertsearch
text: https://github.com/VertNet/webapp/wiki/-API-search-function

title: Find records using a global full-text search of VertNet archives. — vertsearch
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ out <- vertsearch(taxon = "aves", "california", limit=3)  # Limit the number of records returned (under 1000) out <- vertsearch("(kansas state OR KSU)", limit = 200) # Use bigsearch() to retrieve >1000 records  # Find multiple species using searchbyterm(): # a) returns a specific result out <- searchbyterm(genus = "mustela", species = "(nivalis OR erminea)") vertmap(out)  # b) returns a non-specific result out <- vertsearch(taxon = "(mustela nivalis OR mustela erminea)") vertmap(out)  # c) returns a non-specific result splist <- c("mustela nivalis", "mustela erminea") out <- lapply(splist, function(x) vertsearch(taxon = x, lim = 500)) out <- dplyr::bind_rows(lapply(out, "[[", "data")) vertmap(out)  # curl options vertsearch(taxon = "Aves", limit = 10, callopts = list(verbose = TRUE)) # vertsearch(taxon = "Aves", limit = 10, callopts = list(timeout_ms = 10)) } # }

title: rvertnet 0.8.0

title: rvertnet 0.8.0
text: searchbyterm() bigsearch() reworked: functions now first parameter ..., accepts valid query parameter. many query parameters functions bit overwhelming. See ?searchbyterm docs details (#66)

title: rvertnet 0.8.0
text: decode request URL printing R console users can easily see request done (#67) vignette title fix (#68)

title: rvertnet 0.8.0
text: searchbyterm() fix: booleans need converted VertNet’s expected 0/1 instead true/false (#66)

text: CRAN release: 2018-04-17

title: rvertnet 0.7.0
text: add month day params searchbyterm (#64)

title: rvertnet 0.6.2
text: CRAN release: 2017-10-11

title: rvertnet 0.6.2
text: small data source used one function web, moved - data source now within pkg quite small, now pkg won’t break file moved (#61) (#62)

title: rvertnet 0.6.0
text: CRAN release: 2017-08-15 Added Code Conduct.

title: rvertnet 0.6.0
text: Now using crul package HTTP requests instead httr (#57) Note verbose parameter replaced messages throughout package. Now function search trait data: traitsearch() (#55)

title: rvertnet 0.6.0
text: dump functions now defunct. functions tried help users work bulk Vertnet data - setup gotten complex (#56)

title: rvertnet 0.6.0
text: Improvements documentation traitsearch() function fields given data (#58) thanks @gaurav vertsearch() searchbyterm() gain new parameter only_dwc, allows optionally return Darwin Core fields

title: rvertnet 0.6.0
text: Small fix vertsummary() (#59)

title: rvertnet 0.5.0
text: CRAN release: 2016-09-23

title: rvertnet 0.5.0
text: searchbyterm() gains new parameter query allow full text search, much like vertsearch(), ability also use parameters available searchbyterm() (#53)

title: rvertnet 0.5.0
text: Use dplyr::bind_rows instead deprecated dplyr::rbind_all (#51) remove personal email address tests (#52) Namespace base R pkg fxn calls (methods/stats/utils), removed package dependencies didn’t really need (plyr) (#54)

title: rvertnet 0.4.4
text: CRAN release: 2016-04-14

title: rvertnet 0.4.4
text: Updated docs better indicate use cursor feature (#49) Now using explicit encoding specification using httr::content() (#47)

title: rvertnet 0.4.4
text: Fixed externalptr error internal vert_GET() function (#48)

title: rvertnet 0.4.1
text: CRAN release: 2015-12-02

title: rvertnet 0.4.1
text: Fixed bug bigsearch() forgotten internal conversion logical input 0/1 needed web API (#46)

title: rvertnet 0.4.0
text: CRAN release: 2015-11-26

title: rvertnet 0.4.0
text: New set functions make working VertNet data dumps easier. dump_links() gives links various data dump resources; dump_init() initialized SQLite database connection; dump_tbl() creates dplyr::tbl object, can used dplyr query. setup requires user manually download data dumps uncompress, load SQLite. hope make process easier future. (#36)

title: rvertnet 0.4.0
text: Fixes vertmap() new ggplot2 version (#43) Added note docs bigsearch() read data obtaining data (#44)

title: rvertnet 0.4.0
text: Fix searchbyterm() function. parameter stateprovince used, lead error, param requires different handling params. (#45)

title: rvertnet 0.3.4
text: CRAN release: 2015-09-16

title: rvertnet 0.3.4
text: New function vert_id() get occurrence records occurenceid, , single occurrence ids. (#40)

title: rvertnet 0.3.4
text: Explicitly import non-base R functions (#39)

title: rvertnet 0.3.4
text: Lowercase occurenceID occurrenceid simplify life (#41)

title: rvertnet 0.3.0
text: CRAN release: 2015-06-26

title: rvertnet 0.3.0
text: searchbyterm() bigsearch() parameters accept multiple values. Fixed allow (#37) Internals searchbyterm(), spatialsearch(), vertsearch() reworked use cursor internally paging bigger result sets. (#25)

title: rvertnet 0.3.0
text: Replaced data.table import dplyr Using skip_on_cran() (#38) Minor vignette updates (#35) Metadata now returned data requests (#33)

title: rvertnet 0.2.2
text: CRAN release: 2015-01-22 Package completely reworked new VertNet API.

title: rvertnet 0.2.2
text: functions vertavailablemaps(), vertlocations(), vertoccurrence(), vertoccurrencecount(), vertproviders(), verttaxa() now defunct. can call functions, print error message, saying defunct. Gained new functions bigsearch(), searchbyterm(), spatialsearch(), vertsummary(). Gained new author: Chris Ray

title: rvertnet 0.2.2
